creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: flat planes of color; two trees in foreground; rocks in middle ground; white wall topped with black and blue roof tiles in background; three birds--one on low branch, one on rock at center bottom, one in high branch at top center; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
marks: in left margin, embossed: inscription LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [White Wall]; LRC
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
title: White Wall
